t:
After her suicide, me and my wife decided to perform a ritual to summon the devil to bring our daughter back to life.



The devil looks at me confused, “For the ritual to work, the child needs to be yours too, sir”.
c:
Was the absence of life less painful that I've to deal with the absence of love too?





#suicide #backtolife #rituals #devil #daughter #notmine #betrayal #surprise
